page.title: 14Moving from Langford School.
page.content: When the children reach the September following their eleventh birthday they must leave Langford School and go on to Burford Secondary School.They must leave their small school of 71 children and go on to a school with over 1,000 children in it. They are transported by coach each day to Burford.They leave the village at about 7.50am. to start school at 8.30am. School finishes at 3.15pm. In their last term at Langford School some of the teachers from Burford School visit one morning to talk to the children. Near the end of the term they spend a whole day at Burford meeting some of their new teachers and classmates and looking around the buildings and grounds. They also have the opportunity to visit the school with their parents one evening in the July Term.
